channel.title: Communication on HeroLFG
channel.description: Recent content in Communication on HeroLFG

item.title: My Paths Forward Policy
item.description: The Paths Forward policy idea was developed by Elliot Temple. You can see the history of updates for this post by using github version control. My Policy I am willing to spend over 1 hour per day on average having public conversations with people on the internet. You can join my discord server. I plan on helping to build a better discussion plugin for this site instead of disqus and recommend against using disqus for now.
